elements.description:
# oe-input

`<oe-input>` is a control for text input based on Polymer's `paper-input` control with following additional features.

## Features
  1. Control level validations.
  2. Model-level/cross-field validations. When any UI control is placed on the form, the control needs to be 'aware' of 'which property' on the model it is bound to. This is required specially since, many times two or more controls take part in deciding the model validity. (cross-field-validations)
  3. Support internationalization of labels and error-messages out of box.
  4. `oe-input` adds a little red-asterisk if the field is 'required'.

    <oe-input required field-id="accountName" label="Account Name"></oe-input>

## Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling

CSS Variable | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--paper-input-container-invalid-color` | Color applied to asterisk indicating, required field | `--paper-deep-orange-a700`
`--paper-input-container-color`         | Default container color        | `--secondary-text-color`
`--oe-label-mixin`                      | Mixin applied on label         |

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

methods.name: _validate
methods.description:
Returns a validity flag to check maxlength and minlength validation. Overridden from
OEFieldMixin to provide validation function.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Connected Callback to initiate 'change' listener with validation function.

methods.name: _focusBlurHandler
methods.description:
Forward focus to inputElement. Overriden from IronControlState.
Fix : set focused property only if the event is not from a slotted element.

elements.name: OeInput

elements.description:
### oe-decimal
`<oe-decimal>` is a control for capturing number inputs with following features.

  1. control level validations
  2. model-level/cross-field validations. When any UI control is placed on the form, the control needs to be 'aware' of 'which property' on the model it is bound to. This is required specially since, many times two or more controls take part in deciding the model validity. (cross-field-validations)
  3. support internationalization of labels and error-messages out of box.
  4. `oe-decimal` adds a little red-asterisk if the field is 'required'.
  5. Handling of decimal display, parsing and formatting.

    <oe-decimal required field-id="interestRate" label="Rate" precision=2></oe-decimal>

### Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

CSS Variable | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--paper-input-container-invalid-color` | Color applied to asterisk indicating, required field | --paper-deep-orange-a700`
`--paper-input-container-color`         | Default container color        | `--secondary-text-color`

properties.name: percentage
properties.description: Boolean flag specify if the value is a percentage.

properties.name: precision
properties.description: Precision to show in the display when the value is entered.

properties.name: noGrouping
properties.description:
Boolean flag to specify if grouping should not be done on the display value.
This changes the display between 100000 and 1,00,000. Will override "grouping" property

properties.name: format
properties.description:
String denoting the Intl.NumberFormat to display
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/NumberFormat

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

methods.name: ready
methods.description: Initializes the default formatter

methods.name: _formattingChanged
methods.description: Formats the value and set it in the inputElement

methods.name: _initialiseFormatter
methods.description: Gets the navigator language and creates a Internationalization number formatter

methods.name: _parseShorthand
methods.description: Parses short-hand inputs like 2K or 1M into respective values.

return.desc: Decimal value of the parsed shortHand input.

methods.name: _parseDecimal
methods.description: Parses the input string with groupSeperators like ','

params.name: inputStr
params.description: String to be parsed to decimal

return.desc: decimal of parsed String or undefined if the input string is invalid.

methods.name: _format
methods.description: Formats the number based on the formatter.

methods.name: _valueChanged
methods.description: Observer called on value changed to format the input value

methods.name: _displayChanged
methods.description: Observer called when the user enters the value in the input

methods.name: _checkMinMaxValidity
methods.description: Checks for min/max validation for the value

methods.name: _focusBlurHandler
methods.description:
Forward focus to inputElement. Overriden from IronControlState.
Fix : set focused property only if the event is not from a slotted element.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description:
Iron-Input.inputElement remains undefined (looks like _initSlottedInput only for
subsequent dom-change)

elements.name: OeDecimal

attributes.name: percentage
attributes.description: Boolean flag specify if the value is a percentage.

attributes.name: precision
attributes.description: Precision to show in the display when the value is entered.

attributes.name: no-grouping
attributes.description:
Boolean flag to specify if grouping should not be done on the display value.
This changes the display between 100000 and 1,00,000. Will override "grouping" property

attributes.name: format
attributes.description:
String denoting the Intl.NumberFormat to display
https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/JavaScript/Reference/Global_Objects/NumberFormat

elements.description:
`oe-amount`
 An element which combines the currency and amount inputs.
 Example:
   <oe-amount label="Amount Input"></oe-amount>

properties.name: inputElement
properties.description: Returns a reference to the input element.

properties.name: label
properties.description: Label for the component

properties.name: value
properties.description: Describes the value of the element, which has currency and amount.

properties.name: defaultCcy
properties.description: Default initial currency code

properties.name: ccyList
properties.description: An array of currencies.

properties.name: ccyListUrl
properties.description: Remote URL to fetch the currency list.

properties.name: ccyDisplayField
properties.description:
Stores the property from the currency list items to be
used as display property for oe-combo.

properties.name: ccyValueField
properties.description:
Stores the property from the currency list items to be
used as value property for oe-combo.

properties.name: isFocused
properties.description: Boolean that floats the label on focus on the input.

properties.name: errorMessage
properties.description: The error message to be displayed

properties.name: max
properties.description: Max limit for value

properties.name: min
properties.description: Min limit for value

properties.name: required
properties.description: Is field mandatoty

properties.name: disabled
properties.description: Is field disabled

properties.name: precision
properties.description: Default precision used when not available on currency.

properties.name: ccyErrorMessage
properties.description: Show this error when currency field is in error

properties.name: amtErrorMessage
properties.description: Show this error when amount field is in error

methods.name: _validate
methods.description:
Applies when form validate method is called to check
if the values are provided.

return.desc: Returns true/false, according to validation success/failure respectively.

methods.name: _ccyListChanged
methods.description:
Applies when currency list is set/updated.
If existing currency is present in newList, find and set as new selectedCurrency
otherwise, select first currency by default.

elements.name: OeAmount

attributes.name: label
attributes.description: Label for the component

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Describes the value of the element, which has currency and amount.

attributes.name: default-ccy
attributes.description: Default initial currency code

attributes.name: ccy-list
attributes.description: An array of currencies.

attributes.name: ccy-list-url
attributes.description: Remote URL to fetch the currency list.

attributes.name: ccy-display-field
attributes.description:
Stores the property from the currency list items to be
used as display property for oe-combo.

attributes.name: ccy-value-field
attributes.description:
Stores the property from the currency list items to be
used as value property for oe-combo.

attributes.name: is-focused
attributes.description: Boolean that floats the label on focus on the input.

attributes.name: error-message
attributes.description: The error message to be displayed

attributes.name: max
attributes.description: Max limit for value

attributes.name: min
attributes.description: Min limit for value

attributes.name: required
attributes.description: Is field mandatoty

attributes.name: disabled
attributes.description: Is field disabled

attributes.name: precision
attributes.description: Default precision used when not available on currency.

attributes.name: ccy-error-message
attributes.description: Show this error when currency field is in error

attributes.name: amt-error-message
attributes.description: Show this error when amount field is in error

elements.description:
### oe-file-input

`<oe-file-input>` is a input control that lets the user to select single or multiple file(s) and POST them to a specified URL.
The files can be selected either by using the file picker dialog or by dragging and dropping into the control.
Images can be previewed before uploading.

`valueType` property specifies how the selected file data is loaded and set as `value` property.

|multiple |valueType|value    |Description|
|---------|---------|---------|-----------|
| true    |   -     | [File]| When `multiple` is set as true, the `valueType` is ignored and `value` is always set as Array[`File`].|
| false   | file    | File    | Selected `File` object is set as-it-is to the value|
| false   | stream  | Data Stream| The selected file is read as data-url and is set as value|
| false   | binary  | Binary file content| The file contents are read as binary string and set as value|

properties.name: multiple
properties.description: Flag to allow multiple files to be selected

properties.name: isbulkUpload
properties.description: Flag to send files in a single upload

properties.name: accept
properties.description:
File types to be allowed
As specified by (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept)

properties.name: valueType
properties.description:
Specifies what information is extracted from the selected file and set as value.
file | stream | binary

properties.name: value
properties.description: Current value depending on the specified _valueType_

properties.name: fileName
properties.description: Name of the currently selected file.It is undefined or empty for multiple upload

properties.name: files
properties.description: Currently selected files

properties.name: postUrl
properties.description: If set, the selected file data is uploaded to this Url

properties.name: uploadAttributes
properties.description:
Passes the required fields to the file upload method.
It is a key value pair passed as it is to the formdata.

properties.name: uploadProgress
properties.description: Gives the details of progress of the files being uploaded

properties.name: _enableUpload
properties.description: Private property to check if upload is availabel.

methods.name: dragEnterOver
methods.description: Prevent default drag event

methods.name: drop
methods.description: Calls process files on the dropped files.

methods.name: _isImage
methods.description: Checks if the file type is a image

methods.name: __checkEnableUpload
methods.description: Checks if user can post the files.

methods.name: _fileSelected
methods.description: Calls processFiles with the files from input element.

methods.name: processFiles
methods.description: Processes the files based on 'valueType' and sets 'value','fileName' and 'fileType'.

methods.name: _selectFile
methods.description: Launches fileInput after resetting its value

methods.name: listToArray
methods.description: Converts fileList to array of files

methods.name: uploadFiles
methods.description:
Uploads files to the 'postUrl' and fires
'files-uploaded' event on success

methods.name: _sendFile
methods.description: Posts a file to the given Url using XHR and sets the result in '__uploadResult'

methods.name: abortFileUpload
methods.description:
Aborts file upload of files that are still uploading and fires
'files-upload-aborted' event.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Connected callback to handle templating if custom template is present.

elements.name: OeFileInput

attributes.name: multiple
attributes.description: Flag to allow multiple files to be selected

attributes.name: isbulk-upload
attributes.description: Flag to send files in a single upload

attributes.name: accept
attributes.description:
File types to be allowed
As specified by (https://developer.mozilla.org/en-US/docs/Web/HTML/Element/input#attr-accept)

attributes.name: value-type
attributes.description:
Specifies what information is extracted from the selected file and set as value.
file | stream | binary

attributes.name: value
attributes.description: Current value depending on the specified _valueType_

attributes.name: file-name
attributes.description: Name of the currently selected file.It is undefined or empty for multiple upload

attributes.name: files
attributes.description: Currently selected files

attributes.name: post-url
attributes.description: If set, the selected file data is uploaded to this Url

attributes.name: upload-attributes
attributes.description:
Passes the required fields to the file upload method.
It is a key value pair passed as it is to the formdata.

attributes.name: upload-progress
attributes.description: Gives the details of progress of the files being uploaded

events.name: files-upload-aborted
events.description: Occurs on succesful cancel or abort of the files

events.name: files-uploaded
events.description: Occurs on succesful upload of the files

elements.description:
### oe-json-input

`<oe-json-input>` is a control for multiline text input based on Polymer's `paper-textarea` control with following additional features.

  1. control level validations
  2. model-level/cross-field validations. When any UI control is placed on the form, the control needs to be 'aware' of 'which property' on the model it is bound to. This is required specially since, many times two or more controls take part in deciding the model validity. (cross-field-validations)
  3. support internationalization of labels and error-messages out of box.
  4. `oe-json-input` adds a little red-asterisk if the field is 'required'.


### Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

CSS Variable | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--paper-input-container-invalid-color` | Color applied to asterisk indicating, required field | `--google-red-500`
`--paper-input-container-color`         | Default container color        | `--secondary-text-color`

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native textarea.

properties.name: inputElement
properties.description: Returns a reference to the input element.

properties.name: rows
properties.description: Inital number of rows of the textarea

properties.name: maxRows
properties.description:
Maximum number of rows the textarea can grow untill it scrolls.
0 means no limit.

methods.name: _displayChanged
methods.description: Parses the entered input as JSON and validates

methods.name: _valueChanged
methods.description: Displays the prettified JSON value

methods.name: _validate
methods.description: Validates if the entered value is a valid JSON object.

methods.name: _ariaLabelledByChanged
methods.description: Set aria-labelledby on the textarea within iron-autogrow-textarea

methods.name: _ariaDescribedByChanged
methods.description: Set aria-describedby on the textarea within iron-autogrow-textarea

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Attaches change event listener on inputElement

elements.name: OeJsonInput

attributes.name: rows
attributes.description: Inital number of rows of the textarea

attributes.name: max-rows
attributes.description:
Maximum number of rows the textarea can grow untill it scrolls.
0 means no limit.

elements.description:
### oe-input-masked

`<oe-input-masked>` is a control for text input based on `oe-input`control with following additional features.

  1. mask the each char with a specified char, based on a RegExp pattern
  2. mask the each matched pattern with a specified string, based on a RegExp pattern
  3. add specified number of mask char(s) at the end of the specified input.

properties.name: _focusableElement
properties.description:
Returns a reference to the focusable element. Overridden from
PaperInputBehavior to correctly focus the native input.

properties.name: display
properties.description: Masked value to display in the control

methods.name: _validate
methods.description:
Returns a validity flag to check maxlength and minlength validation. Overridden from
OEFieldMixin to provide validation function.

methods.name: connectedCallback
methods.description: Connected Callback to initiate event listeners.

methods.name: _buildValue
methods.description: Builds the maked display based on the `value` of the input

methods.name: _blured
methods.description: Appends specified number of characters to the input on blur

methods.name: _focused
methods.description: Removes the appended characters to the input on focus

methods.name: _reformat
methods.description: Mask the value and set masked display

params.name: c
params.description: character to be used for masking

elements.name: OeInputMasked

attributes.name: display
attributes.description: Masked value to display in the control

elements.description:
### oe-textarea

`<oe-textarea>` is a control for multiline text input based on Polymer's `paper-textarea` control with following additional features.

  1. control level validations
  2. model-level/cross-field validations. When any UI control is placed on the form, the control needs to be 'aware' of 'which property' on the model it is bound to. This is required specially since, many times two or more controls take part in deciding the model validity. (cross-field-validations)
  3. support internationalization of labels and error-messages out of box.
  4. `oe-textarea` adds a little red-asterisk if the field is 'required'.

    <oe-textarea required field-id="accountName" label="Account Name"></oe-textarea>

### Styling

The following custom properties and mixins are available for styling:

CSS Variable | Description | Default
----------------|-------------|----------
`--paper-input-container-invalid-color` | Color applied to asterisk indicating, required field | `--google-red-500`
`--paper-input-container-color`         | Default container color        | `--secondary-text-color`
